subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova, coming off a two-month layoff with an elbow injury, won her 22nd career title, defeating Kristina Barrois, 7-5, 6-1, in the Strasbourg International final in France.
snippet: Maria Sharapova, coming off a two-month layoff with an elbow injury, won her 22nd career title, defeating Kristina Barrois, 7-5, 6-1, in the Strasbourg International final in France.
